DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this retrospective single center study was to evaluate the clinical utility of histological and immunohistochemical analyses of specimens obtained by endoscopic ultrasound-guided fine needle aspiration (EUS-FNA).
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Ultrasound-guided Fine Needle Aspiration of Solid Masses: Histological and Immunohistochemical Evaluation
DOC.criteria: We retrospectively reviewed medical records of patients who underwent EUSFNA to evaluate solid pancreatic or peripancreatic lesions from January 2009 to July 2010 Patients with unavailable data
